physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Marked dysphoria and irritability despite treatment.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially, dysphoria and irritability persisted despite treatment; however, after adding nefazodone, there was marked improvement in mood, decreased irritability and impulsivity, better sleep, and reduced anxiety within 2 weeks.
Initial serum levels between 7.0 and 8.3 µg/ml; increased to 10.8 µg/ml after nefazodone addition; required a 40% total reduction in carbamazepine due to elevated levels and side effects.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Diminished depth perception, sedation, slurred speech, and hypensomnia reported.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms emerged after starting nefazodone at 100 mg b.i.d.; serum carbamazepine level increased to 15.1 µg/ml leading to discontinuation of nefazodone.
